source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SEQ_00<tab>Yozan is ready to begin investigating.
target: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SEQ_00<tab>ドマ冒険者団のヨウザンは、調査を開始するようだ。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SEQ_01<tab>Koharu has found the suspicious Lalafells, and is trailing them. Follow the rest of the Doman Adventurers' Guild to where she is hiding near the southeast gate of Revenant's Toll.
target: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SEQ_01<tab>ドマ冒険者団は、怪しいララフェル族の四人組を調査することにした。モードゥナのレヴナンツトールにある南東の門近くにいる「コハル」と話そう。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SEQ_02<tab>Koharu has found the cart and two of your four suspects. However, this brings up the question of how to prove the criminals' guilt. After a stroke of brilliance, Yozan and Rokka put on a show for the two Lalafells. They pretend that the stolen grimoire contains the location of a hidden treasure. Suitably persuaded, the two suspects run off. Meet with Yozan to the east of Camp Revenant's Toll in hopes of heading off the criminals.
target: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SEQ_02<tab>コハルに、ララフェル族たちを確認してもらった。コハルが見たという四人組に間違いないようだ。犯人であることを確認するために打った芝居で、四人組が犯人である可能性が濃厚となった。崩壊したキャンプの東にいる「ヨウザン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SEQ_03<tab>Hiding in a gully, you watch as four Lalafells wander towards the camp, the stolen grimoire in hand. You and the Doman Adventurers' Guild rush towards them, revealing that the tale of treasure was all merely a ploy. In a fit of pique, the leader, Gagarua, calls for his allies to teach you a lesson. Speak with him, and defeat his henchmen should they attack you.
target: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SEQ_03<tab>崩壊したキャンプ近くの岩陰に隠れ、ヨウザンと話した。しばらくすると、ララフェル族の四人組が「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A3701 /var>」を持ってやってきた。誘い出されたことに気が付いた頭目のガガルアは、ドマ冒険者団を懲らしめるよう仲間に指示を出す。崩壊したキャンプの東の「ガガルア」と話し、襲いかかってくるようなら返り討ちにしよう。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SEQ_04<tab>You successfully fend off Gagarua's gang. Now speak with the man himself, and see if he will come quietly.
target: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SEQ_04<tab>ガガルアの仲間たちが襲ってきたが、返り討ちにした。もう一度「ガガルア」に、話しかけてみよう。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SEQ_05<tab>Upon realizing who you are, Gagarua calls his allies to him, and summons something down upon you from the skies. By the time you realize that this was all a trick, the criminals have run away. However, they have left the aged grimoire in their haste. Retrieve this valuable piece of evidence now.
target: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SEQ_05<tab>ガガルアたちは、冒険者の正体に気付いたようだ。強気なガガルアたちは、ハッタリでドマ冒険者団の視線を上空に逸らすと、一目散に逃げ去った。崩壊したキャンプの東に置かれた「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A3701 /var>」を入手しよう。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SEQ_06<tab>You have retrieved the grimoire from where it was left. Show it now to Yozan.
target: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SEQ_06<tab>ロウェナ記念会館から盗まれた<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A3701 /var>を入手した。崩壊したキャンプの東の「ヨウザン」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SEQ_07<tab>Yozan is happy that you now have the means to clear the name of the Doman Adventurers' Guild, and bids you present the aged grimoire to Slafborn back in Revenant's Toll forthwith.
target: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SEQ_07<tab>ヨウザンに、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A3701 /var>を取り戻したことを話した。レヴナンツトールの「スラフボーン」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A3701 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SEQ_08<tab>Slafborn gratefully accepts the stolen grimoire, and listens to your tale exonerating the children. Yozan makes it clear that they are all adventurers now, and Slafborn agrees with the hint of a smile on his lips. He watches as the children run away, presumably to find some new quest, and asks that you guide them with a gentle hand, and protect them with your strong arm.
target: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SEQ_08<tab>スラフボーンに、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A3701 /var>」を渡した。スラフボーンは、子どもたちがガガルア一味から「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A3701 /var>」を取り返したことに驚いたようだ。スラフボーンに認められた「ドマ冒険者団」の小さな冒険者たちは、満足そうにその場を後にした。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Koharu.
target: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_TODO_00<tab>コハルと話す

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Yozan.
target: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_TODO_01<tab>ヨウザンと話す

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Gagarua and defeat his henchmen.
target: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_TODO_02<tab>ガガルアと話し、その仲間たちを討伐

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Gagarua.
target: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_TODO_03<tab>ガガルアと話す

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_TODO_04<tab>Pick up the aged grimoire.
target: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_TODO_04<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A3701 /var>を入手

target: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_TODO_05<tab>ヨウザンと話す

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_TODO_06<tab>Deliver the aged grimoire to Slafborn.
target: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_TODO_06<tab>スラフボーンに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A3701 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_000<tab><var 08 E905 ((Miss)) ((Mister)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Koharu's found our suspects!
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_000！
まずは、ララフェル四人組を調査してみようよ。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_001<tab>They've parked their cart around the southeast gate. Come on, let's go investigate. But be quiet─we don't want them to know we're onto them yet.
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_001南東の門手前に、荷車を留めているはずだから、
こっそりとコハルに確認してもらおう！

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_KOHARU_000_010<tab>I told you I'd find them!
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_KOHARU_000_010フッフッフ……。
やはり「ピーン」と来てしまいましたね。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SHIUN_000_015<tab>What if they're armed? Shouldn't <var 1A 02 /var>we<var 1A 01 /var> have weapons, too?
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SHIUN_000_015ララフェル四人組かぁ……武器とか持ってたらどうしよう……。
念のために、忍具を取りに帰った方がいいんじゃないかな？

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_ROKKA_000_020<tab>I don't know why Koharu thinks this is fun. We're supposed to be clearing our names, aren't we?
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_ROKKA_000_020……そのララフェル四人組、調べてみる価値はありそう。
それにしてもコハルは、なんであんなに楽しそうなのかしら。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_KOHARU_000_030<tab>See? See? Those are our Lalafells, all right!
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_KOHARU_000_030……うん、間違いないよ。
今は、ふたりだけみたいだけど、最近来た四人組の人たちだ。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SHIUN_000_031<tab>But how do we prove they're our criminals? From here, it doesn't look like they've got the grimoire. Could it be hidden in their cart?
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SHIUN_000_031でも、犯人かどうか、どうやって確認するの？
見た感じだと魔道書なんて持ってなさそうだし。
荷台の中にあるのかな？

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_ROKKA_000_032<tab>The other two might have it as well. Or maybe...we've got the wrong people.
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_ROKKA_000_032……今いないふたりが持っている可能性もあるわね。
そもそも、全く関係ない可能性もね。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_033<tab>I think I've an idea of how to find out. Rokka, can you play along?
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_033オレに、考えがある。
……ロッカ、ちょっと手伝ってくれ。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_ROKKA_000_034<tab>Have you heard about Rowena's store? They're saying someone stole a grimoire from it!
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_ROKKA_000_034……そういえば、知ってる？
ロウェナさんのところから盗まれた魔道書の話。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_035<tab>That's old news! I think they've even given up hunting for the criminals. <sigh> It's too bad, though. I wanted that grimoire for myself.
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_035知ってるよー。
悔しいよな、オレが手に入れてやろうと思ってたのにさ！

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_ROKKA_000_036<tab>Why? Because it's got the location of the treasure─
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_ROKKA_000_036あの魔道書……「レヴナンツトールの財宝」の在り処が、
隠されているんでしょ？

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_037<tab>Shhh! Do you want <var 1A 02 /var>everyone<var 1A 01 /var> to know about all the buried gold and jewels!? And what about the weapons, hm?
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_037そう……かつての冒険者たちが、密かに集めた金銀財宝！
あのガレマール帝国に、勝るとも劣らない究極兵器！

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_038<tab>They say those are stronger than the Empire's! I spent so much time learning that the treasure's in Camp Revenant's Toll, but I'll <var 1A 02 /var>never<var 1A 01 /var> find it now...
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_038隠し場所が「崩壊したキャンプ」だってとこまでは掴んだのに。
せっかくの苦労がムダになったよ。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_ROKKA_000_039<tab>Well, not without the grimoire, anyway. So why not just give up while you're ahead?
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_ROKKA_000_039……魔道書がなければ、見つけるのは無理ね。
もう、諦めなさいよ。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_WAWATON_000_040<tab>Did you hear that? The lad just said there's gold and silver and weapons out 'round that old camp! Ohoho, imagine how pleased the boss'll be with this! Come on, let's go!
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_WAWATON_000_040……おい、今の話聞いたか？
金銀財宝に、究極兵器！
こうしちゃいられない、すぐに報告だ！

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_LILINA_000_041<tab>I'm awake! I'm awa... Huh? Where'd you go?
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_LILINA_000_041えっ！？
……あれ、おにいちゃんどこ？

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_WAWATON_000_042<tab>Move yourself, Sister! Time's a-wasting!
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_WAWATON_000_042おい、早く来い！
急いで報告だ！！

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_LILINA_000_043<tab>W-Wait! I can't run as fast as you!
target: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_LILINA_000_043<tab>ちょっと、まってよ～。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_KOHARU_000_044<tab>That was brilliant, Yozan! If they're our criminals, they'll show up at the camp with the grimoire.
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_KOHARU_000_044やるね、ヨウザン！
これで魔道書を持ってきたら、犯人確定だね。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_ROKKA_000_045<tab>And if the other two are anything like that duo, we shouldn't have any trouble catching them.
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_ROKKA_000_045……仲間のふたりは、キャンプの外に出かけていたみたいね。
ほかのふたりも、あんな感じだったら扱いやすいんだけど。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SHIUN_000_046<tab>That's a relief! I was expecting hardened criminals, but that lot couldn't frighten a baby horsebird.
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SHIUN_000_046ふふふ、あんまり怖そうな人たちじゃないかも。
ちょっとホッとしたよ。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_047<tab>We just have to beat them to Camp Revenant's Toll now. From the way they took the bait, I don't think we have much time. We'd better hurry!
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_047あの食いつきようだ、アイツらで間違いない。
きっと、魔道書を持って「崩壊したキャンプ」にやってくる！
オレたちも先回りして、アイツらが来るのを待とう！

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_050<tab>Koharu, are you sure that's them?
target: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_050<tab>コハル、どうだ……アイツらで間違いないか？

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SHIUN_000_055<tab>We're good at passing unseen, but not in the middle of town! Mister Slafborn will see us if we're not really, really careful...
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SHIUN_000_055僕たち気配を消すのも得意だけど……
さすがにここにいたら、スラフボーンさんも気付きそう……。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_ROKKA_000_060<tab>Watching Koharu and Yozan work together is exciting, isn't it?
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_ROKKA_000_060……実は、この中で一番好奇心旺盛なのは、コハルなのよね。
ヨウザンとふたりで行動しているコハルを見てると、
なんだかハラハラしてきちゃう。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_070<tab>I hope they'll come quietly. But if they don't, you'll have to take care of them, <var 08 E905 ((Miss)) ((Mister)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_070早く来ないかなー。
大人しく捕まってくれれば、それでよし。
もし抵抗するなら、の出番だからな！

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_071<tab>Gold, jewels, weapons... All hidden somewhere in this dump, where no one would think to look.
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_071(-頭目らしき男-)ここに財宝が眠っているのか！
クヒヒ……金銀財宝も、究極兵器も、すべていただくぞ！！
遂に俺さまの時代が到来するのだ！！！

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_072<tab>I think I'll take it all. Garlemald laid my homeland to waste, and so I'll use the riches to rebuild. And the weapons, oh, I will use them to make the world mine!
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_072(-頭目らしき男-)これで夢にも、一歩近づいたというわけだ。
帝国も、エオルゼアも、すべて手に入れてやる！
やつらに滅ぼされた、俺さまの国を再建するのだ！！

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BABARA_000_073<tab>Of all the secrets of eld I thought this grimoire held, the location of a lost treasure was not one...
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BABARA_000_073財宝を探すカギは、盗んだ魔道書にあるんだったな。
「古の秘術」目的で盗んだコレに、
まさか、こんな秘密まで潜んでいたとは……。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_074<tab>Well, 'tis but a matter of knowing where to look. Tell us─how do we read it? Is there a cipher? Or must we use some sort of incantation?
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_074(-頭目らしき男-)……で、この魔道書をどうすればよいのだ？
何か暗号でも記されているのか、それとも呪文でも唱えるのか……。
おい、どうなんだ？

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_WAWATON_000_075<tab>Er... That is a good question! I'll be sure to tell you just as soon as I learn the answer!
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_WAWATON_000_075さぁ……。
……どうするんでしょうね？

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_076<tab>WHAT!? You buffoon! Why did you not think to find out!?
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_076(-頭目らしき男-)オマエ、聞きだしてこなかったのか！
こーの、バカタレが！！

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_WAWATON_000_077<tab>Erp! I...I'm sorry, Gagarua, it just didn't seem important at the time!
target: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_WAWATON_000_077<tab>も、申し訳ありません、ガガルア様。

source:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_078(-Gagarua-)Why you─ Hm? What are they doing...?
Go play elsewhere. Adults are working here, children.
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_078(-ガガルア-)なんだ、あのお子ちゃまたちは……？
俺さまは忙しいんだ。
遊ぶなら余所でやってくれ。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_079<tab>We're not children─we're the Doman Adventurers' Guild! We're here to arrest you for stealing the grimoire from Rowena's!
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_079オレたちは「ドマ冒険者団」だ！
ロウェナさんのところから、
魔道書を盗んだのはオマエたちだな！

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_WAWATON_000_080<tab>Oh, oh! Gagarua, those are the children who talked about the treasure! <var 1A 02 /var>They'll<var 1A 01 /var> know how to read the grimoire for sure.
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_WAWATON_000_080ガガルア様、この子たちですよ！
この子たちが、財宝のこととか、
魔道書に秘密があることを話していたんですよ。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_081<tab>(-Gagarua-)...
target: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_081<tab>(-ガガルア-)…………。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BABARA_000_082<tab>You two have been had. I <var 1A 02 /var>knew<var 1A 01 /var> something smelled fishy about this.
target: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BABARA_000_082<tab>……騙されましたね。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_083<tab>(-Gagarua-)You prize pair of pinheads!
target: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_083<tab>(-ガガルア-)こーの、バカタレが！！

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_084<tab>(-Gagarua-)No one makes a fool of Gagarua, you hear me!? No one! We shall teach these younglings a painful lesson about meddling in others' affairs! Come, summon the <var 1A 02 /var>thing<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_084(-ガガルア-)この俺さまを欺くとは、ただでは済まさないぞ！
こうなったら少し痛い目を見てもらおう。
おい、アレを呼べ！！

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BABARA_000_085<tab>What thi─ Oh, that. It's not here.
target: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BABARA_000_085<tab>……いませんよ。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_086<tab>(-Gagarua-)...Why is that?
target: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_086<tab>(-ガガルア-)……なんで？

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BABARA_000_087<tab>You sent it away, Gagarua. You said it would draw too much attention to us.
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BABARA_000_087ガガルア様が、今回の仕事からは外したのではありませんか。
目立つからって。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BABARA_000_088<tab><sigh> ...So <var 1A 02 /var>we'll<var 1A 01 /var> just do the dirty work, then?
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BABARA_000_088……仕方がありませんね。
では、私たちが少し懲らしめてあげましょう。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_KOHARU_000_090<tab>Oooh, this is all terribly exciting!
target: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_KOHARU_000_090<tab>なんだか、ドキドキしてきちゃった。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SHIUN_000_095<tab>We learned how to wait silently and unseen in Doma. Yozan never took to it as well as we did, though...
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SHIUN_000_095潜んで、じっと待つ……。
ドマにいたころは、そんな修行もしたよ。
ヨウザンは苦手だったみたいだけどね。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_ROKKA_000_100<tab>It's all very well waiting around for our criminals, but what do we do once they're here?
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_ROKKA_000_100……ヨウザンったら、待ち伏せするのはいいけど、
犯人がやってきた後はどうするつもりなのかしら。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_110<tab><var 1A 02 /var>One<var 1A 01 /var> of you against all three of mine? Hah! You don't stand a...a mammet's chance in the hells!
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_110俺さまたちは、すーっごく強いぞ。
怪我しても知らないからな！
お前ら、やっちまえー！！

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_120<tab>Just do like you did with Mister Boulder, <var 08 E905 ((Miss)) ((Mister)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_120の戦いが、また見られるんだな！
大技決めちゃってよ！！

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_KOHARU_000_125<tab>I'll leave them to you, <var 08 E905 ((Miss)) ((Mister)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. But someday, I'll show you what Miss Yda taught me!
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_KOHARU_000_125ここは、に譲ってあげましょう。
いつか私も、イダお姉ちゃん仕込みの、必殺拳を見せてあげるね。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SHIUN_000_130<tab>This doesn't seem like a fair fight. Can we help? From back here, I mean.
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SHIUN_000_130敵は複数だね……。
僕も、後方から支援した方がいいかな？

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_ROKKA_000_135<tab>I'll heal you if you get hurt, <var 08 E905 ((Miss)) ((Mister)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Later. When I have a potion.
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_ROKKA_000_135……あの人たち、なんだか自信あるみたい。
なら心配ないと思うけど気をつけてね。
ケガしたら、あとで薬塗ってあげるよ。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_140<tab>Twelve above, where did those younglings find so puissant a protector!?
target: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_140<tab>オ、オマエ、恐ろしく強いな……。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BABARA_000_141<tab>I've got a feeling I've seen <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> before... Wait! Quick, everyone, come here!
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BABARA_000_141それにしても、どこかで見たような……
……まさか！？　ガガルア様！！

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BABARA_000_142<tab>It's little wonder we were outmatched─that is <var 29 EB02 /var>, the hero of the Scions!
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BABARA_000_142あの者の正体がわかりました。
例の「暁の英雄」ですよ。
たしか、。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_WAWATON_000_143<tab>You don't mean the <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var> who's beaten a load of primals, and smashed the imperial...er, ultimatum weapon to bits!?
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_WAWATON_000_143蛮神を次々倒して、帝国のなんとかって兵器まで、
粉々に破壊したっていうアイツですか？

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_144<tab>We can discuss <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> deeds and why <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> is with the children later, Wawaton! Babara, Lilina, we must do as we practiced!
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_144なんで、そんなやつが子どもたちと一緒にいるんだ？
……仕方がない、こうなったらアレをやるぞ。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_145<tab>Ahem... Well met, Scion! Yes, we know full well who you are. But hear me─you won't be adding <var 1A 02 /var>us<var 1A 01 /var> to your list of fallen foes! Are you ready, my friends?
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_145まさかオマエが、あの英雄殿だったとはな。
だが、決して俺たちを捕まえることはできない。
ババラ、ワワトン、リリナ、準備はいいな！

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_146<tab>As our forefathers before us, we have a winged beast in our thrall, whose strength is so great as to tear primals in twain and turn brave men to whimpering wretches! O mighty Valefor, we summon you with our prayers─descend from the heavens, and vanquish our foes!
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_GAGARUA_000_146見せてやろう、俺のとっておきの秘技を……！
一族に伝わりし、蛮神をも屠るとされる翼獣！
我らの祈りに導かれ、天空より舞い降りよ、ヴァルファーレ！！

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_KOHARU_000_147<tab>...Isn't something supposed to happen?
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_KOHARU_000_147何か降りてくるのかな？
……なかなか現れないね。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_148<tab>Damn it, they got away!
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_148あっ……！
アイツらいないぞ！！

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_ROKKA_000_149<tab>Hey! There they go. Faster than they look, aren't they?
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_ROKKA_000_149……見て、あんなところにいるわ。
とっておきの逃げ足ね、たいしたものだわ。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_150<tab>That was a queer bunch, make no mistake! But they forgot one thing─the grimoire!
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_150なんだか、おかしなやつらだったな。
犯人には逃げられちゃったけど、
魔道書は無事取り返せたから、オッケーだよな！

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_160<tab>Come on, <var 08 E905 ((Miss)) ((Mister)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─get them!
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_160あと一歩だ。
、一気に追いつめようぜ！

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_KOHARU_000_165<tab>Wow! You beat them faster than you beat Mister Boulder, <var 08 E905 ((Miss)) ((Mister)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_KOHARU_000_165の戦いは、いつ観ても興奮するね！
今度は私も一緒に戦いたいなー。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SHIUN_000_170<tab>Something tells me this isn't over...
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SHIUN_000_170なんだろう……。
まだ、これで終わりじゃない気がするよ。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_ROKKA_000_175<tab>They're much better at talking about fighting than actually fighting...
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_ROKKA_000_175……口ほどでもなかったわね。
これなら、私たちでもなんとかできたかもね。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_180<tab><var 08 E905 ((Miss)) ((Mister)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, get the grimoire.
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_180なんだか、おかしなやつらだったな。
犯人には逃げられちゃったけど、
魔道書は無事取り返せたから、オッケーだよな！

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_KOHARU_000_185<tab>They seemed fun. I hope I can talk to them again, someday.
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_KOHARU_000_185とっても愉快な人たちだったね。
今度は、少しおしゃべりしてみたいかも。
またどこかで会えるかな？

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SHIUN_000_190<tab>They turned tail and ran when they learned who you were, <var 08 E905 ((Miss)) ((Mister)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SHIUN_000_190の正体がわかって、あの人たち怯えてたよね。
偉そうにしてたけど、結構臆病なのかも。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_ROKKA_000_195<tab>I wonder how those four are related...
target: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_ROKKA_000_195<tab>……あの四人組は、どういう関係なのかしら？

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_200<tab>Hah! Now that we've got the grimoire, all we need to do is show it to Mister Slafborn and explain what happened! Come on, what are we waiting for?
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_200よし、魔道書も無事に回収完了だ！
急いでスラフボーンのところに行こう！

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SLAFBORN_000_210<tab>What did the Doman children have to say for themselves?
target: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SLAFBORN_000_210<tab>どうだ、ドマの子どもたちは何か言っていたか？

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SLAFBORN_000_211<tab>The younglings and the grimoire? So it is as I feared, and they are responsible for stealing it, yes?
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SLAFBORN_000_211冒険者よ、ご苦労だった。
だが、魔道書がここにあるということは……
……やはり、その子たちが犯人だったのか？

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SLAFBORN_000_212<tab>Gagarua? No, I cannot say I am familiar with him. But if you say he and his conspirators are to blame, then I will believe it. I will report to the guild, and ensure we all are on lookout for that gang.
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SLAFBORN_000_212ふむ、なるほど……。
そのガガルアとかいう男の一味が、
魔道書を盗んだというのだな。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SLAFBORN_000_213<tab>Well, you may consider yourselves exonerated. That you reclaimed the grimoire and your good names says much of your bravery, younglings.
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SLAFBORN_000_213そ奴らに関しては、冒険者ギルドに報告しておく。
それにしても、本当に子どもたちが真犯人を見つけて、
魔道書を取り戻してきたというのか？

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_214<tab>Mister Slafborn, we are <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> younglings!
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_214スラフボーン、子どもたちじゃないよ。
オレたちのことは、こう呼んでくれよ！

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_215<tab>We are the Doman Adventurers' Guild! All the world will soon know our name, and one day, we'll even be more famous than <var 08 E905 ((Miss)) ((Mister)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_YOUZAN_000_215「ドマ冒険者団」ってさ！
いつか、を超える冒険者になって、
エオルゼアだけじゃない、世界に名を轟かす英雄になるんだぜ！

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SLAFBORN_000_216<tab>More famous than <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, eh? Well, I look forward to seeing that.
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SLAFBORN_000_216ふふふ……それは、楽しみだ。
……では、あらためて礼を言おう。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SLAFBORN_000_217<tab>Well, as one adventurer to another, let me say well done! You outfitted yourselves with honor today, my friends!
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SLAFBORN_000_217よくやった！
「ドマ冒険者団」の小さき英雄たちよ！

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SLAFBORN_000_218<tab>What brave men and women they are becoming, eh? But they are still in the bloom of youth─growing, yet not fully grown.
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SLAFBORN_000_218まだ子どもだと思っていたが、もういっぱしの冒険者か……。
だが、まだ芽吹いたばかりのツボミだ。
彼らが花を咲かせるには、今しばらく時間がかかるだろう。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SLAFBORN_000_219<tab>They need a gentle hand to guide them, and a strong arm to protect them. Pray, friend, be that for them.
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_SLAFBORN_000_219暁の英雄よ。
その時まで、あの子たちを導いてやってほしい。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BALLOON_000_000<tab>Anyone who stands before Gagarua must fall!
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BALLOON_000_000ガガルア様の敵は、
すべて排除します！

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BALLOON_000_010<tab>Hmph. You know your way around a fight, I'll give you that.
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BALLOON_000_010なるほど……。
あなた、なかなかやりますね。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BALLOON_000_020<tab>Gods above, who <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> you!?
target: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BALLOON_000_020<tab>なんて強さなの……。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BALLOON_000_030<tab>Aaarrrggghhh!
target: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BALLOON_000_030<tab>いっくぞー！

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BALLOON_000_040<tab>Lilina! Oi, Lilina! I'm hurting here!
target: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BALLOON_000_040<tab>こっちも回復してくれよ！

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BALLOON_000_050<tab><pant> Bloody tiring, this...
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BALLOON_000_050ハァハァ……。
もう疲れました……。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BALLOON_000_060<tab>Hm? What're we─ Oh, right!
target: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BALLOON_000_060<tab>がんばりま～す。

source: TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BALLOON_000_070<tab>Ow! That'll leave a bump...
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BALLOON_000_070う～ん痛いよ～。
……タンコブできちゃったよ。

source:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BALLOON_000_080Hrnnnggg!
...Oooh, I'm going down, I'm going down...
target:
TEXT_SUBLAK003_00100_BALLOON_000_080ケ、ケアウラン……。
……噛んじゃった。
